amendment.description: Amendment grants the Secretary of the Interior the ability to add a lease sale area to a finalized 5 year plan, as long as all of the National Environmental Policy Act requirements have been met on that specific area within the last 5 years.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 1 printed in House Report 113-493 to grant the Secretary of the Interior the ability to add a lease sale area to a finalized 5 year plan, as long as all of the National Environmental Policy Act requirements have been met on that specific area within the last 5 years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wittman amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 244 - 172 (Roll no. 360).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wittman amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 244 - 172 (Roll no. 360).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Wittman.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
